Discover a Timeless Teaching from the Bhagavad Gita Every Time You Open a New Tab

- Enhance your day with the wisdom of the Bhagavad Gita, delivered in short, insightful teachings right on your new tab. The Gita Tab extension brings powerful lessons from this ancient text into your everyday life, available in English, Hindi, and Sanskrit.

- Whether you're online or offline, you'll receive a fresh, summarized teaching each time you open a new tab, helping you stay connected to the Gitaâ€™s timeless philosophy.

- Added dark mode for a soothing reading experience at any time of day
- Subtle fade-in animation for a more immersive experience
- Available in English, Hindi, and Sanskrit
- More chapters and teachings are continuously being added to enrich your experience. Take the wisdom of the Bhagavad Gita with you, wherever you go!
